They were enduring."},{"lineNumber":42028,"originalJapaneseLine":"……しかし、戦っても戦っても良くなる兆しがない。","translatedEnglishLine":"...However, no matter how much they fought, there was no sign of improvement."},{"lineNumber":42029,"originalJapaneseLine":"じわじわと押し潰されるかのように、","translatedEnglishLine":"Like being gradually crushed,"},{"lineNumber":42030,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼスは滅びへと向かおうとしていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Zeth was heading towards destruction."},{"lineNumber":42031,"originalJapaneseLine":"「っ、もう……何してるの、ランス……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"D-dammit... What are you doing, Rance...?"},{"lineNumber":42032,"originalJapaneseLine":"　…………助けてよ……っ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"...Please... help me...\""},{"lineNumber":42033,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、マジック」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"O-Oh, Magic.\""},{"lineNumber":42034,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え…………！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh...!?\""},{"lineNumber":42035,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kya...\""},{"lineNumber":42036,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃわあああぁぁぁぁっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kyaaaaaah!?!\""},{"lineNumber":42037,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス一行が、前触れもなくゼス司令部に現れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance’s group appeared at the Zeth headquarters without any warning."},{"lineNumber":42038,"originalJapaneseLine":"「すご……ホントにマークの……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Amazing... This is really Mark..."},{"lineNumber":42039,"originalJapaneseLine":"　しかも、司令部に直接……」","translatedEnglishLine":"and, moreover, directly inside the headquarters...\""},{"lineNumber":42040,"originalJapaneseLine":"「祖母様からヒントを頂きすぎているからな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Because I have received too many hints from grandmother."},{"lineNumber":42041,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この程度、挑戦の内に入らん」","translatedEnglishLine":"This level doesn't even count as a challenge.\""},{"lineNumber":42042,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ、な、な、なに！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, w-w-what!?\""},{"lineNumber":42043,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あなたたち、どこから……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Where did you all come from…!\""},{"lineNumber":42044,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス一行は、一人残らずゼスの司令部へと","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and his group, without exception,"},{"lineNumber":42045,"originalJapaneseLine":"転移されていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"were teleported to Zeth headquarters."},{"lineNumber":42046,"originalJapaneseLine":"「て、転移魔法……はっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"T-teleportation magic... ha!\""},{"lineNumber":42047,"originalJapaneseLine":"「永久客人っ……ルーシー様！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Permanent guest... Lady Lucy!?\""},{"lineNumber":42048,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、あ…………！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, ah...!\""},{"lineNumber":42049,"originalJapaneseLine":"ルーシーの姿を見た途端、千鶴子が膝をついた。","translatedEnglishLine":"The moment Chizuruko saw Lucy's figure, she dropped to her knees."},{"lineNumber":42050,"originalJapaneseLine":"マジックも慌てて深く一礼する。","translatedEnglishLine":"Magic also hurriedly bowed deeply."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ。あんまり孫が楽しそうでねえ」
「お主が来たからであろ」
「そればかりじゃなさそうだから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It doesn't seem to be only that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 可笑しいのさ。いい顔で笑ってるよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's strange. He's smiling with a good expression."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふぅん……」
「……ん。よし、いくぞ。皆の者、下がるがいい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Hmm. Alright, let's go. Everyone, step back."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミラクルが、前方の空間へと集中し始める。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miracle began to concentrate on the space ahead.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やがて周囲に光が集まり始めて、
ひとつの形になっていく。
「ゲート……コネクト！」
一閃された手から膨大な魔力が吐き出され、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A flash from the hand unleashed a huge amount of magical power,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは扉の形へと、徐々に収束していった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: which gradually converged into the shape of a door.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――ゼス臨時首都、マーク。
千鶴子とマジックは、
今日も各地の指揮と状況分析に追われていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: once again busy directing and analyzing the situation across various locations today.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……と、西部はこんな所ね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...So, this is how the west is.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カバッハーン老も独力で、よく耐えてくれてる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Old Kabahaan is also holding out well on his own."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……東部戦線は？　報告ないの？」
「ランス総統の話？
それなら、相変わらず行方不明だけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If that’s it, he’s still missing as usual..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ、それだけじゃなくて！」
「それ以外も相変わらず。被害は止まらないし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Everything else is also unchanged. The damage doesn't stop,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦線もどうにか膠着はさせられてるわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and although the front lines are somehow stalemated,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……ただし消耗しながら、だけどね」
状況は、悪化の一途を辿っていた。
決定的な破滅は、訪れていない。凌いでいる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Decisive ruin had not come. They were enduring.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……しかし、戦っても戦っても良くなる兆しがない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...However, no matter how much they fought, there was no sign of improvement.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じわじわと押し潰されるかのように、
ゼスは滅びへと向かおうとしていた。
「っ、もう……何してるの、ランス……
「お、マジック」
「きゃっ……」
「きゃわあああぁぁぁぁっ！？」
ランス一行が、前触れもなくゼス司令部に現れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance’s group appeared at the Zeth headquarters without any warning.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「すご……ホントにマークの……
しかも、司令部に直接……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and, moreover, directly inside the headquarters..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「祖母様からヒントを頂きすぎているからな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because I have received too many hints from grandmother.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この程度、挑戦の内に入らん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This level doesn't even count as a challenge."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えっ、な、な、なに！？
あなたたち、どこから……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Where did you all come from…!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス一行は、一人残らずゼスの司令部へと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and his group, without exception,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 転移されていた。
「て、転移魔法……はっ！」
「永久客人っ……ルーシー様！？」
ルーシーの姿を見た途端、千鶴子が膝をついた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The moment Chizuruko saw Lucy's figure, she dropped to her knees.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックも慌てて深く一礼する。

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
